name: SuperGrid Demo
description:
This is a playable 3d platformer mini-game from SuperGrid to demonstrate environment and features of the pack.

SuperGrid is a pack for Unreal Engine 4 of special materials and modular meshes designed to make level prototyping workflow faster, easier and more fun! If you love dynamic and straightforward level creation process then you will feel right at home — you can move, rotate and scale meshes without fear of texture stretching or distortions

  • No texture stretching during scaling and movement!
  • Material alignment is object based, so it won't get "scrolling" effect during movement and rotation like tri-planar materials usually do
  • A lot of different meshes for prototyping(There are more than shown)
  • Variety of materials with different themes
  • Mini game that shows features of the pack
